content.question: Which of the following most likely influenced the author’s perspective regarding the “age of discovery” in the passage?

choices.label: Cold War scholars emphasized the achievements of Western culture.
Increased globalization led scholars to investigate the precolonial contributions of non-Western regions.
Marxist scholars emphasized the role of class conflict in history.
Feminist scholars asserted that traditional gender norms influenced European colonialism.

content.answer: Increased globalization led scholars to investigate the precolonial contributions of non-Western regions.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
